$st@map-preview: Heatmap trading is a unique strategy because it doesn't require a chart for analysis and allows you to view several tools simultaneously. They're displayed as digital data on currency pairs. Their dynamics are what should be used to select the direction for options being purchased.
$st@map-text:
Estrategia de mapa de calor

La estrategia de mapa de calor es un indicador que representa las cotizaciones de divisas contra diferentes activos en tiempo real. El indicador ofrece al traders una imagen clara de la situación en los mercados de valores

Si se utiliza correctamente, el mapa de calor de divisas da señales para un trading rentable.

¿Por qué elegir este indicador en particular?

Este indicador permite a los traders realizar transacciones sin ningún análisis fundamental y técnico, es decir, básicamente, sin ningún gráfico. Para aumentar la eficiencia de las operaciones, la mejor ventana posible debe durar entre 15 y 30 minutos.

¿Cómo se usa la estrategia de mapa de calor para trading?

El mapa de calor es un gráfico similar a un tablero de ajedrez con cotizaciones de divisas y tasas de activos. La línea horizontal representa un activo mientras que la línea vertical representa a otro y su punto de cruce indica el aumento o la disminución del precio del primer activo en relación con el otro. Hay cinco colores diferentes utilizados en el mapa de calor:

  • verde para el activo que está sobrecomprado, se espera una caída de precio;
  • rojo para el activo que está sobrevendido, se espera una suba de precio;
  • verde claro para el activo con tendencia a un estado de sobrecompra;
  • rojo claro para para el activo con tendencia a un estado de sobreventa;
  • gris para un estado sin movimiento.

Podemos ver el análisis del mapa de calor con un ejemplo:

Los pares de divisas disponibles para las transacciones bajistas se representan en el mapa térmico como puntos de cruce de activos en verde:

  • AUD/EUR
  • AUD/USD
  • AUD/JPY
  • AUD/GBP
  • AUD/CHF
  • AUD/CAD
  • CAD/CHF
  • NZD/USD
  • NZD/JPY
  • NZD/CHF

Los pares de divisas disponibles para las transacciones alcistas se representan como puntos de cruce de activos en rojo:

  • EUR/AUD
  • USD/AUD
  • JPY/AUD
  • GBP/AUD
  • CHF/AUD
  • CAD/AUD
  • USD/NZD
  • JPY/NZD
  • CHF/NZD

Debe prestar atención al verde y al rojo, ignorando los colores más claros así como al gris.

Recomendaciones de trading

  • Caducidad: 15-30 minutos
  • Inversión: 2% de su depósito

Mapa de calor
$st@turn-title: Estrategia de reversión para el trading
$st@turn-preview: Estrategia de reversión para el trading se ejecuta sin ningún indicador. Un trader debe saber cómo analizar el gráfico de velas y las transacciones abiertas en el momento oportuno. Durante una sesión de trading, la tendencia hace varias reversiones en ambas direcciones, lo que significa que el trader puede obtener una ganancia significativa si captura el momento adecuado.
$st@turn-text:
Estrategia de reversión para el trading

La Estrategia de reversión para el trading se ejecuta sin ningún indicador. Un trader debe saber cómo analizar el gráfico de velas y las transacciones abiertas en el momento oportuno. Durante una sesión de trading, la tendencia hace varias reversiones en ambas direcciones, lo que significa que el trader puede obtener una ganancia significativa si captura el momento adecuado.

¿Por qué elegir esta estrategia en particular?

La estrategia es bastante sencilla. Permite detectar las reversiones de tendencia y, por lo tanto, tomar decisiones rentables. Muchos traders consideran que es una ventaja que la estrategia no incluya indicadores y requiera el análisis del gráfico de velas solamente.

¿Cómo se utiliza la estrategia de reversión para trading?

Asegúrese de activar la vista del gráfico de velas antes de empezar a operar. Para ello, basta con elegir el tipo de gráfico correspondiente:

Un modelo de vela con dos velas, una alcista y otra bajista, debe considerarse como una señal reversa:

La condición principal: las velas deben ser similares en tamaño:

Sus sombras también deben ser similares en tamaño:

En el ejemplo, la vela alcista sigue a la vela bajista, lo que significa que la tendencia está haciendo una reversión ascendente y usted debe comprar una opción de venta.

Recomendaciones de trading

  • Tiempo de gráfico: 5 minutos
  • Caducidad: 15-30 minutos
  • Inversión: 2% de su depósito
$st@absorption-preview: La estrategia de absorción implica una combinación particular de velas en las que cada una de las siguientes velas es mayor, desde el punto inferior al superior, que el anterior. Para beneficiarse de esta estrategia, no puede utilizar indicadores. Sin embargo, es importante seguir el gráfico de velas y abrir transacciones del tipo correcto en el momento adecuado.
$st@absorption-text:
Absorption Strategy

The absorption strategy implies a particular combination of candles in which each of the following candles is bigger, from the lower to the higher point, than the previous one. When benefitting from this strategy, you may not use indicators, however, it is important to follow the candlestick chart and open transactions of the right type at the right moment.

Why Choose This Particular Strategy?

Based on the Japanese candlestick absorption model, this strategy is used without indicators. If properly used, the absorption strategy may become one of the strongest models for gaining profit as it displays the crucial point in buyers and sellers’ relationship on the market.

How Is the Absorption Strategy Used in Trading?

To use this strategy in trading, make sure you activate the candlestick chart view by choosing the relevant option in the menu bar:

A trend on the market is a key condition for opening a transaction.

Another key condition that comes out of the trend on the market is the occurrence of an absorption model on the chart. In general it looks like this:

Upon a closer view, you can see the bullish candle (the green one) as if it is being absorbed by the bearish candle (the red one). This means sellers currently prevail on the market. Therefore, one should buy a PUT option:

Trading recomendations

  • Expiration: 15-30 minutes
  • Investment: 2% of your deposit
$st@news-preview: La estrategia de trading según noticias es fundamental. Sin embargo, no excluye el análisis técnico. El gráfico no siempre se comporta como se predice en la noticia. Por lo tanto, la capacidad de esperar se considera crucial para que esta estrategia resulte rentable.
$st@news-text:
News Trading

News trading belongs to fundamental strategies. However, it does not exclude technical analysis. The chart does not always behave as predicted upon the news release. Therefore, the ability to wait is deemed to be crucial for profitable news trading.

Why Choose This Particular Strategy?

News trading has proved to be one of the most popular albeit rather difficult trading strategies on currency markets.

Every day, the world receives various news that dictates short-term price movements. The market brings together the currencies of the majority of the countries, which means economic and political news of a particular country will influence the national currency rate in pairs. This provides us with broad opportunities for successful trading.

What Stands Behind Profitable News Trading?

First of all, make sure you activate the candlestick chart view by choosing the relevant option in the menu bar, if you have not done this before:

In addition, you need the economic calendar, which can be found here:

Our economic calendar is easy to use: pay attention to news and events marked in red, they have a significant impact on the market:

You should check the economic calendar each time you start a trading session. When important news comes out, previously reliable indicators and trading systems happen to generate false signals. This is no surprise, because a fundamental factor may bring great volatility to the market.

This is the reason why experienced traders prefer to pause when important news is about to come out. This explains low activity on the markets when charts display prices in a sideways trend. However, this makes it possible to determine the price channel. Upon the release of news, a movement occurs and once the price channel is broken, you should immediately enter into a transaction in the strike direction.

The example shows that a news release brought a lot of buyers to the market which resulted in a broken price channel. This means you should buy a CALL option:

Remember that a plummeting exchange rate resulting from the news does not last forever: usually the rate gradually reverts to the level it was at before the information was released. Therefore, if you did not manage to open a relevant type of the transaction immediately after the release of the news, it is better not to risk trying to catch the trend going away. You might want to pause and resume trading in a couple of hours when the market digests the news and regains its stability.

Trading recommendations

  • Expiration: 15-30 minutes
  • Investment: 2% of your deposit
$st@gap-preview: Una brecha es una ruptura de precios debido a un gran volumen. Los movimientos principales se producen en los gráficos de los días laborables. Sin embargo, las tendencias también continúan funcionando continuamente en los fines de semana. Las cotizaciones oficiales de los viernes pueden cambiar significativamente el sábado y el domingo, lo que brinda a los traders la oportunidad de obtener una ganancia fácil el lunes.
$st@gap-text:
Gap Trading

A gap is a price break due to a large volume. The main movements occur on the charts on business days, however, trends also continue to run continually at weekends.

Official Friday quotations may significantly change on Saturday and Sunday, which provides traders with an opportunity to make an easy profit on Monday.

Why Choose This Particular Strategy?

This trading strategy is universal and enables you to make a profit in binary options with any assets, which is its main advantage. As we know, currency exchanges and stock exchanges are opened during business days only, which means the closing price on Friday may significantly change during the weekend and open with a big gap on Monday. Such rate breaks are called gaps and they quite often take place in exchange trade. They provide an opportunity to make a good profit at the very beginning of the trading week while preparing for the opening.

How Is the Gap Strategy Used in Trading?

If you have not used the candlestick chart view for the analysis before, make sure you activate it by choosing the relevant option in the menu bar:

You should open transactions in the direction of the gap which occurred during the weekend. The example presents a down gap, which means there are a lot of sellers on the market and you can proceed with opening a bear transaction:

Trading recomendations

  • Expiration: 15-30 minutes
  • Investment: 2% of your deposit
$st@pinocchio-preview: La estrategia de Pinocho se ha ganado su nombre gracias a las velas de pin bar que se asemejan a la cabeza del personaje de cuento de hadas. El cuerpo de la vela representa la cabeza mientras que la sombra es muy similar a la nariz de Pinocho. Cuando usted descubre una vela así en su gráfico, está a punto de ocurrir un cambio de tendencia. Cuanto más larga sea la nariz, más probable es que ocurran cambios en el gráfico. La estrategia de Pinocho se destaca por su sencillez y eficacia.
$st@sar-preview: El sistema parabólico SAR es uno de los indicadores más populares entre los comerciantes interesados en el análisis técnico. Es sencillo de usar, pero muy eficaz. Permite detectar la inversión de la tendencia en el gráfico de velas y tomar una decisión que conduzca a ganancias.
$st@sar-text:
SAR Strategy

The parabolic is an indicator allowing you to evaluate both price movements and the moment of their reversal. The full name of the indicator is the parabolic SAR, where the first word means the direction of the curve on the chart while SAR represents the abbreviation for “Stop and Reverse”.

The indicator is among the most requested technical analysis tools. The parabolic SAR makes it possible to reduce the lag effect when reading the chart, provided there is a trend on the market.

Why Choose This Particular Indicator?

The parabolic SAR is similar to another popular indicator -— the moving average. However, the parabolic SAR is faster, which allows it to change its location against prices in response to a market trend. The parabolic SAR features numerous advantages such as:

  • it is simple to use;
  • the ability to track prices in real time;
  • the ability to track prices in real time;

How Is the Parabolic SAR Used in Trading?

Trading with the parabolic SAR as a tool should be explained through an example. For a start, you should activate the indicator on the chart. In order to do so, in the Indicator section, find and choose SAR:

Once the indicator is activated, a dotted curve, the parabolic SAR, appears on the chart.

The indicator can be easily interpreted: the dotted curve placed below the price is deemed to indicate an upward direction, whereas the dotted curve placed above the price is considered to signify a downward direction.

One should open a position once the parabolic meets the price on the candlestick chart. The example below, with the dotted curve above the price, shows a downward trend. The dot below the price represents the change in the trend and is to be deemed as a signal to buy a call option.

When using the parabolic SAR, one should ignore the price in a sideways trend.

Given such conditions, the indicator may lead to wrong signals. In order to prevent them, one should carefully examine whether the trend has been long-established on the market. Properly used, the parabolic SAR will very soon prove to be reliable.

Trading recomendations

  • Expiration: 15-30 minutes
  • Investment: 2% of your deposit
$st@traders-title: Trading según la elección de los traders
$st@traders-preview: El trading según la elección de los traders es un indicador diseñado para dar un panorama de trading para un activo en particular en cualquier momento. A veces, el análisis técnico se queda corto y un trader experimenta una serie de transacciones fallidas, por lo que hay que tener en cuenta que la psicología de los traders es un factor importante de mercado que a menudo conduce a una decisión correcta.
$st@traders-text:
Traders Choice Strategy

This strategy is suitable for traders who prefer to rely on the psychological factor of the market while opening a trade. The Traders’ choice indicator is helpful in such situations. This indicator demonstrates the ratio of traders who open Buy and Sell positions. The trader's task is to open a deal based on the majority opinions.

Why Should You Use This Strategy?

The trading strategy using the Traders’ choice indicator is the simplest, because it doesn’t require in-depth analysis and long trading experience. The indicator reflects one of the main market factors — the choice of trading participants which affects the chart’s behaviour:

  • asset’s buying volume is higher — the price is going up;
  • asset’s selling volume is higher — the price is going down.

How Is the Traders’ Choice Strategy Used in Trading?

To understand the main idea of the strategy, we will show an example of how to use the Traders' Choice indicator in trading.

This indicator is located on the right side of the platform:

If the majority of traders open Buy positions, then the green color will dominate on the indicator scale. It means you need to open a Buy position, as well.

You should open a Sell position, when the red color dominates on the indicator scale and shows that most traders open a Sell position.

The scale can also show data when the ratio of green and red is approximately the same. In such a situation, we recommend choosing another asset for trading.

Trading recommendation:

  • Expiration: 15-30 minutes
  • Investment: 2% of your deposit
$st@trends-preview: Utilizado correctamente, el trading de tendencia es una estrategia simple pero rentable. La capacidad de definir visualmente una tendencia en el gráfico es una capacidad crucial para un trader. Al ser una estrategia de línea de base, proporciona oportunidades comerciales masivas para un trader y, por lo tanto, merece ser utilizada de forma regular.
$st@trends-text:
Trend Trading Strategy

A trend shows the direction of the asset price. Trend trading is considered to be a baseline trading strategy on the stock market. We offer you both guidance on this trading method and recommendations on opening transactions.

Why Choose This Particular Strategy?

To trade with the trend is very easy. The only skill you have to have is defining whether it is an uptrend (the price is mainly going up) or a downtrend (the price is mainly going down) that is currently taking place. Trends are set at stock exchanges where different assets are set out for sale. Nevertheless, the trends are based on technical and fundamental grounds. That is why the careful analysis of the chart is of utmost importance when trading with the trend.

How to Trade with the Trend?

First of all, you have to determine the direction of the trend. To do so, draw an ascending line — the angle should be restricted by crossing points with the line chart. The example below clearly states that the price goes up which means we are dealing with an uptrend here:

The next step would be finding the maximum or minimum price. As we have the uptrend here, let us spot a local maximum on the graph:

Once the local maximum is broken, further ascension of the trend is expected, which means we have to buy a call option:

As you can see in the example, the local maximum was broken, and the price kept going up.

Trading recomendations

  • Expiration: 15-30 minutes
  • Investment: 2% of your deposit
$st@price-title: Trading dentro del canal de precio
$st@price-text:
Estrategia de canal de precios

Si prefiere hacer transacciones sin prisa y con confianza en el resultado, puede que desee intentar operar dentro del canal por la noche. Esta estrategia puede ser utilizada para todos los activos, pero fuera de la sesión regular de trading ya que las transacciones rentables requieren una tranquilidad absoluta en el mercado.

¿Por qué elegir esta estrategia en particular?

Fuera de las sesiones regulares, los activos se ven principalmente en una tendencia lateral. En este momento, la mayoría de los traders que se benefician de la volatilidad de los precios se retiran. Sin embargo, operar de noche le ofrece dos ventajas significativas:

  • un lento movimiento del precio;
  • un comportamiento predecible del mercado;

Así que operar dentro del canal a menudo genera una ganancia significativa para un trader con el enfoque correcto.

¿Cómo operar dentro del canal?

Utilicemos un ejemplo para operar dentro del canal.

  1. Elija un activo que no se opere actualmente durante la sesión regular.
  2. Marque el precio más alto y el más bajo en el gráfico.
  3. La dirección horizontal del tipo de cambio eventualmente ocurre

Ahora analice los datos obtenidos y aproveche las siguientes señales en el gráfico:

  • cuando el precio del activo se aproxime al límite superior del canal, coloque una opción de venta;
  • cuando el precio del activo se aproxime al límite inferior del canal, coloque una opción de compra:

Tenga en cuenta que a veces el precio puede no alcanzar el límite superior del canal de precio o puede superarlo un poco. Cuando se opera fuera de la sesión regular, tal comportamiento se considera normal y la tasa pronto volverá a estar dentro del canal. Para sentirse seguro, proceda con sus transacciones un poco más tarde.

Recomendaciones de trading

  • Tiempo de gráfico: 5 minutos
  • Caducidad: 15-30 minutos
  • Inversión: 2% de su depósito
$st@price-preview: Los mercados nocturnos lentos y con baja volatilidad atraen a traders específicos. En este momento, la estrategia de trading usando canales de precios horizontales demuestra ser muy exitosa. Una vez que se domina esta estrategia, permite realizar un gran número de transacciones rentables en un corto tiempo.
$st@threecandles-preview: La estrategia de tres velas es un ejemplo de un simple sistema de trading que es muy eficaz. Se basa en patrones: busca cuando ciertas fluctuaciones aparecen juntas en un gráfico ya que esto proporciona una base para hacer una predicción efectiva sobre cómo cambiará el precio.
$st@threecandles-text:
Three Candles Strategy

The Three Candles strategy is an example of a simple trading system that is highly effective at the same time. This strategy is based on patterns: it looks for when certain fluctuations appear together on a chart, since this provides a basis for making an effective prediction about how the price will change.

Why should you use this strategy?

The pattern that we will look at in this article is called the Three Candles. Similar patterns that are also well known include the "Three Black Crows" and "Three White Soldiers." The strategy is simple for novices to learn, and experienced traders eagerly use the signals provided by this system and combine them with other trading strategies in their toolkit.

How can I trade using the Three Candles strategy?

In order to determine the first candle in the pattern, you need to pay close attention to your candlestick chart. The first candle that we are looking for has a higher High or a lower Low cap than its neighboring figures.

The next candle is the second bar in the pattern, and how it closes confirms the existence of a pattern. Finally, the third candle is the final one in the series, and it is the one that will make us money.

In order to trade on this strategy, you need to enter the market just as the third candle is starting to take shape immediately after the close of the second candle. You should avoid entering the market if the first two candles are small or if the second candle is too large.

Trading recommendations

  • Expiration: 1 candle
  • Investment: 2% of deposit amount
$st@sevencandles-preview: Tanto a los traders experimentados como a los novatos les gusta operar con la estrategia de siete velas. Este sistema es sencillo de aprender y no requiere conocimiento de las buenas técnicas del mercado. Sin embargo, al mismo tiempo es bastante eficaz y rentable.
$st@sevencandles-text:
Seven Candles Strategy

Both experienced and novice traders like to trade according to the Seven Candles strategy. This system is simple to learn, and it does not require knowledge of the fine technicalities of the market. However, at the same time it is fairly effective and profitable.

Why should you use this strategy?

Despite its simplicity, this strategy is fairly stable. It is designed to be used for trading on the basis of a candlestick chart over the course of an hour. The essence of the strategy is to enter a market with a long-term expiration while ignoring market noise and temporary trends.

How do you trade using a Seven Candles strategy?

First, let's designate a range for our hourly candles of 22:00 GMT to 11:00 GMT. Here we can see 13 candles that need to be divided into red and green. You should enter a market against the movement of most candles over this time frame.

In order to open a long trade, there should be at least 7 red candles across out interval. We are looking for a red candle to open and close within the next few (no more than four) hours. This is a signal to buy an option with a long position.

By like token, if at least 7 green candles appear during this interval of time, we will look for the appearance and closing of a green candle in the next 4 hours. This will give us the signal to buy an option with a short position.

Trading recommendations

  • Expiration: 1–3 hours
  • Investment: 2% of deposit amount
$st@andrewspitchfork-preview: El indicador de Tridente de Andrews es una herramienta técnica analítica. Fue desarrollada por Alan Andrews, ingeniero estadounidense en la Universidad de Massachusetts. La operación de acuerdo con este sistema simplifica significativamente el proceso de trading.
$st@andrewspitchfork-text:
Andrews' Pitchfork Indicator

The Andrews' Pitchfork indicator is a technical analytical tool. It was developed by Alan Andrews, an American engineer at the University of Massachusetts. Trading according to this system significantly simplifies the trading process.

Why should you use this indicator?

This system is an indicator that is suitable for trading on markets that are in correction as well as when trading on a trend. The indicator helps us to "sense" what the trend is, revealing the points when it changes as well as its inflection point.

How do you trade on the basis of the Andrews' Pitchfork indicator?

First of all, you need to add the indicator to your chart.

To determine this indicator, you need to identify the maximum or minimum price on the chart. The highest value of the trendline is used as the first point, the lowest value is the second point, and the third corresponds to the bottom from which the trend should develop. The essence of the indicator is based on predicting where the trend will be stopped or reversed, which often happens within the area of the support and resistance lines.

The indicator must be activated

When the price breaks through the top or bottom line of the indicator, you should make a trade. You should make a trade in the direction in which the price breaks out.

For example, if the price breaks through the resistance line, then we make a trade with a long position.

Trading recommendations

  • Expiration: 3–5 candles
  • Investment: 2% of the amount of the deposit
$st@dominoes-preview: La estrategia de dominó es más adecuada para operar en un mercado no volátil, y el sistema en sí mismo es fácil de seguir: no requiere que el trader tenga un conocimiento profundo de los mercados de divisas.
$st@dominoes-text:
Domino Strategy

The Domino strategy is most suitable for trading on a non-volatile market. The system itself is easy to follow, and it does not require the trader to have in-depth knowledge of currency markets.

Why should you use this strategy?

As we have already said, this strategy is pretty simple, and it is perfectly suited for beginners. The system can be used effectively to trade most assets, and if you clearly adhere to the fundamental principles of the strategy you will be able to generate a good profit. It does not require that you perform a fundamental and technical analysis. It is based on superficial price observations: the more stable the price, the better.

How can I make trades using the Domino strategy?

A candlestick chart is used for trading. To begin with, we need to find an asset with a flat price. The movement of the asset should be horizontal for at least an interval of one hour.

The signal to open a trade is the alternation of red and green candles by at least an eightfold magnitude. We open a trade with a long or short position depending on the color of the final candle in the series. If the candle is green, then we open a trade with a short position, and if the candle is red, then we open a candle with a long position.

In the example, the eighth candle is red, so it means that we should open a trade in the opposite direction (long position).

Trading recommendations

  • Expiration: 1 candle
  • Investment: 5% of the amount of the deposit
$st@macd-preview: El indicador MACD es el mejor para operar en mercados semivolátiles. Sin embargo, el gráfico debe mostrar una tendencia clara. Un gráfico con un rango más estrecho producirá muchas menos señales falsas que usar otros indicadores de tendencia.
$st@macd-text:
MACD Indicator

The MACD indicator is best suited for trading on semi-volatile markets. However, the chart must show a clear trend. A chart with a narrower range will produce many fewer false signals than using other trend indicators.

Why should you use this indicator?

Indicators provide serious assistance to traders. All of them have their own advantages and disadvantages, so it can be useful to use several indicators at once. Thus, oscillators can be used effectively inside a volatile market when the trend changes at inflection points.

The main advantage of the MACD system is that it functions as both a momentum and trend indicator. Since the indicator follows the trend, it can provide correct signals. If you use them properly, they can generate a profit for you.

How do you make trades using the MACD indicator?

First of all, add the indicator to your chart.

The MACD indicator can be combined with various systems. We will consider one of the most effective methods.

When the signal line intersects with the MACD zero level from the bottom up and both histograms are above zero, you should expect a price increase.

When the line crosses the MACD zero level from top to bottom and both histograms are above zero, you should expect a price drop.

Trading recommendations

  • Expiration: 3–5 candles
  • Investment: 2% of the deposit amount
$st@stochastics-preview: Una estrategia de trading basada en el indicador estocástico le permite evaluar el impulso del mercado determinando la posición relativa de cierre de precios en una banda de trading mientras se tienen en cuenta los valores mínimos y máximos en un número determinado de días.
$st@stochastics-text:
Stochastic Indicator

A trading strategy based on the Stochastic indicator allows you to assess market momentum by determining the relative position of closing prices in a trading band while taking into account the minimum and maximum values over a particular number of days. The full name of the indicator is the Stochastic Oscillator.

Why should you use this indicator?

This indicator has gained wide popularity among many traders. The main advantages of a Stochastic trading strategy are ease of use and high effectiveness. The accuracy of the signals depends on how well the indicator is applied.

How do you trade on the basis of the Stochastic indicator?

First of all you need to add the indicator to your graph.

This indicator is best used on stable markets with a low level of volatility. The price should move in a rather narrow trading band. Therefore, it is necessary to make sure that the detected trend has not originated too recently.

If the signal line (red) crosses the main (blue) line from the bottom up, it signals that the asset is oversold, which means that you need to immediately open a trade with a long position.

If the main line drops and crosses the signal line, then this is an indicator that the asset is overbought. Therefore, you should open a trade with a short option.

Trade recommendations

  • Expiration: 2–4 candles
  • Investment: 2% of the deposit amount
$st@bitcoin-preview: El Bitcoin es un nuevo instrumento financiero que está gozando de una enorme demanda de diversos tipos de traders debido al alto nivel de especulación en criptomonedas. El trading en Bitcoins se ha convertido en un fenómeno de mercado autosuficiente.
$st@bitcoin-text:
Trading Bitcoin

Bitcoin is a new financial instrument that is enjoying enormous demand from various kinds of traders due to the high level of speculation in cryptocurrency. Trading in Bitcoin has become a self-sustaining market phenomenon.

Why should you trade Bitcoin?

As you well know, stock exchanges only operate five days per week, and they are closed on Saturday and Sunday. The same is true of trading platforms: the classic currency pair markets also pause for the weekends. But Bitcoin trading never stops, not even for a minute. This means that investors can trade Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies non-stop.

How do you trade Bitcoin?

The cryptocurrency market is the most volatile of those that are available on trading platforms. The Bitcoin exchange rate can vary by dozens of percentage points up or down over the course of a single day.

Before you enter the Bitcoin instrument trading market, you need to consider that its exchange rate is strongly affected by the news, and this cryptocurrency has been affected by long-term trends. You must be able to use indicators competently on a Bitcoin chart in order to be able to trade it effectively and make a stable profit.

The Awesome Oscillator indicator is suitable for trading Bitcoin. Let's add it to the chart

The indicator is located below the graph and is displayed as a histogram. When the histogram's zero level is crossed, it is a signal to complete a trade.

In the example below, we can see that the histogram was crossed from the top down. This means that we should open a trade with a short position.

If the histogram is crossed from the bottom up, then we should open a trade with a long position.

Trading recommendations

  • Expiration: 2–10 candles
  • Investment: 4% of the amount of the deposit
$st@gold-preview: A lo largo de la historia, los traders han sido atraídos al uso del oro como instrumento comercial en los mercados financieros. Hace un tiempo, este metal precioso era equivalente al valor de ciertas monedas, pero ahora todo lo que queda de esos tiempos son solo recuerdos agradables. El oro es un instrumento de trading volátil.
$st@gold-text:
Trading gold

Traders throughout history have been attracted to the use of gold as a trading instrument on financial markets. Once upon a time, this precious metal was equivalent to the value of certain currencies, but now all that remain from those times are pleasant memories. Gold is a volatile trading instrument.

What are the features of trading gold?

The price of gold can fluctuate more than another currency pair over the same period of time. In order to predict the price movement for gold, you need to monitor news about stock markets.

How do you trade gold?

So, our goal is to predict how the price of gold will behave on a chart and to take the right action that will earn us a profit. News reports can help us do this. When the main assets that are traded on the market are in decline, the price for gold will increase. If the economic situation of the central countries is stable, then the value of this precious metal can decline.

Gold can react more sensitively to the news. For example, market data that may affect the price for a currency pair by 50 points can impact the price for gold by more than 100 points. This instrument is most suitable for traders who prefer trading on a highly volatile market.

Always pay attention to the impact of economic news. If it is exerting a large influence, then you can expect a lot of activity and movements in the trend.
$st@correction-title: Trading basado en correcciones de mercado
$st@correction-preview: Una corrección es un cambio en el curso de un mercado tras una tendencia sostenida que hizo que un activo de mercado se volviera demasiado sobrevendido o sobrecomprado. La estrategia de operar basándose en correcciones de mercado es una herramienta básica y debe ser dominada por todo trader.
$st@correction-text:
Trading on Market Corrections

A correction is a change in the course of a market following a sustained trend that caused a market asset to become oversold or overbought. The strategy of trading on market corrections is a basic tool, and it should be mastered by every trader.

Why should you use this strategy?

Financial markets are in constant flux: the prices for assets can both skyrocket and collapse. However, the market equilibrium will sooner or later lead to a correction of the value of assets, moving it back into the direct trading band.

How can you trade on market corrections?

Prices are fluid. If a price rises, then it can fall again. This is the basis of financial markets. Certain price movements are repeated, and a market correction is just one such movement.

It is important to take into account that when an asset is on an upward trend, it should not have any local maxima. Similarly, if it is on a downward trend, there should not be any local minima.

First we should establish the trend. For example, on the candlestick chart we can see an emerging upward trend. We discover a very long candle, after which we can expect an inflection point in the price. This when we open a trade with a short position. We advise you to wait for the moment when it becomes clear that such a turning point will take place. A couple of candles against the trend can tell us this, signaling that a correction is about to take place.

Trading recommendations

  • Expiration: 2–4 candles
  • Investment: 4% of the deposit amount
$st@fibonacci-preview: Muchos traders de opciones binarias utilizan con éxito los niveles en sus operaciones. Los niveles permiten aplicar indicadores técnicos de manera muy eficaz. Uno de los indicadores más efectivos es la Estrategia de retrocesos de Fibonacci.
$st@pinocchio-text:
Pinocchio Strategy

The Pinocchio strategy has gained its name from pin bar candles looking just like the head of the fairy-tale character. The body of the candle stands for the head while the shadow is very similar to Pinocchio’s nose.

When you discover such a candle on your chart, a trend change is about to take place. The longer the nose gets, the more likely it is that changes will occur on the chart. The Pinocchio strategy stands out with its simplicity and efficiency.

Why Choose This Particular Strategy?

The Pinocchio strategy is popular with a wide range of traders, ranging from newcomers to professionals. Clear and simple to use, the strategy is based on frequent signals occurring on the chart and offering a high probability of success. To use this particular strategy in trading, you need a candlestick chart. The aim of the strategy is to look for pin bar candles, or Pinocchios as called by traders.

How the Pinocchio Strategy is Used in Trading?

First of all, make sure you activate the candlestick chart view. You can do this by choosing the relevant option in the menu bar:

As for the example, the model by the Pinocchio strategy involves three candles. The signal comes when a local maximum or a local minimum is hit, signalling a trend change. In this case, the shadow of the candle represents Pinocchio’s nose. The higher it is, the more likely the trend change will occur since the price does not correspond to the trend at this particular moment.

Trading recomendations

  • Expiration: 15-30 minutes
  • Investment: 2% of your deposit
$st@fibonacci-text:
Fibonacci Retracement Strategy

Many traders of binary options successfully use levels in their trading. Levels make it possible to apply technical indicators very effectively. One of the most effective indicators is Fibonacci retracement.

When should I use this strategy?

Everyone knows that Fibonacci strategies should only be used in markets with obvious trends. By contrast, a Fibonacci series is totally unsuitable for flat trading.

How do you trade using a Fibonacci retracement strategy?

First of all, you need to correctly determine the levels. An upward trend involves tracing a line from the lowest point to the highest one. The opposite is true when tracing a downward trend.

Let's add the indicator to the chart.

Let's determine the minimum and maximum prices for the next period.

Having established the direction, we obtain 6 levels with a starting point of 100 and an ending point of 0. By default, the levels are established at the following points: 23.6 (0.236), 38.2 (0.382), 50 (0.5), and 61.8 (0.618). These numbers describe a Fibonacci series. The indicator settings allow you to add new levels and delete old ones. But this should only be done by traders who are experienced and have advanced technical skills. We do not recommend that novices change the standard values.

It is generally accepted that a market correction can occur up to the levels of 38%, 50%, and 62%

Here is our main piece of advice when using this strategy: do not blindly trust the levels that the indicator demonstrates. False signals should be filtered by applying additional instruments.

Trading recommendations

  • Expiration: 1–2 candles
  • Investment: 2% of the deposit amount
$faq@-0-a-0:
Fill out the registration form on the main page. Check your email and confirm your email address by clicking the link we've sent you.

Registration is absolutely free. Fund your account when you're ready to make a real profit. Practice with our demo account before making a deposit.

You're all set to trade once your account is registered. No documentation is needed. All it takes is to accept the Client Agreement in the registration form.
$faq@-0-a-1:
Make your first steps in professional trading easy and risk-free. Get full access to all the platform features with Binarium Demo account. Once your account is set up, practice your trading skills and test your trading strategies with $10,000 on your Demo account. Feel free to switch between Real and Demo accounts in the terminal. On the Demo account you don't deal with the real money and won't be able to withdraw profit.

If you ran out of demo funds, sign out and log in to your account to restore the initial balance.
$faq@-0-a-2: For most payment methods, the minimum deposit requirement is {{@minDepositSum}} or the equivalent in your account currency. After making a deposit in this amount, you can safely start trading and making real profits. Please note that the minimum deposit amount may vary depending on the payment system you use. You can find detailed information about the minimum deposit for each payment systems found in the Cash Register section.
$faq@-0-a-3:
Build your trading confidence and knowledge with the Education section. Our free materials will help you trade smart and find out more about key strategies and assets offered by Binarium.

We provide one-on-one training classes with our best traders. Contact us to learn more.
$faq@-0-a-4: Binarium is only available for persons who have come of legal age.
$faq@-0-a-5: Access Binarium from any device using a mobile browser or install the Android app on your phone.
$faq@-0-q-6: Still have questions? Get in touch with us
$faq@-0-a-6: Get help from our online customer support chat or email us at support@binarium.com to request a callback. We'll contact you within an hour (during customer support operating hours).
$faq@-1-a-0: Trade is a financial instrument that provides a fixed payout if the prediction of the asset price at the expiry time is correct. Place trades based on whether you believe the price of the asset will be higher or lower than the initial. All you need to do is to choose an asset and predict its price dynamics for a selected period. If the trade is successful, you earn the fixed payout (in-the-money). If at the end of the trade the asset price remains at the same level, your investment is credited back to your account with no profit. If the asset's dynamics were predicted incorrectly, you lose the amount of your investment (out-of-the-money), yet without risking all of your capital.
$faq@-1-a-1:
Expiry time determines the moment when the trade is over and you find out if you made a profit.

Binarium offers two types of trades: short-term trades with an expiration time of no more than 5 minutes and trades that last from 5 minutes to 3 months.
$faq@-1-a-2: The expiry rate is the value of the financial asset at the moment of trade expiration. It may be lower, higher or equal to the opening price. The compliance between the expiry rate and the trader's prediction defines the profit.
$faq@-1-a-3: When you predict a Put or High option, you assume that the value of the asset compared to the opening price will fall. A Call or Low option means that you suppose the value of an asset will rise.
$faq@-1-a-4:
Quote relates to the price of an asset at a particular moment. For you as a trader quotes at the trade start (opening price) and end (expiry rate) are particularly important.

Binarium quotes are provided by Leverate, a company with a sound reputation of the market leader.
$faq@-1-a-5: The asset price at the moment of trade opening.
$faq@-1-q-6: Still have questions? Get in touch with us
$faq@-1-a-6: Get help from our online customer support chat or email us at support@binarium.com to request a callback. We'll contact you within an hour (during customer support operating hours).
$faq@-2-a-0: Upon registration, you will be prompted to select the currency of your future account from common currencies from around the world and some cryptocurrencies. Please note that you can't change the account currency after you finish registration.
$faq@-2-a-1: Binarium customers can make deposits and withdraw funds using Visa, Mastercard and MIR bank cards, FKWallet, Yandex.Money, WebMoney, Piastrix e-wallet systems, and the cryptocurrencies Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin and Ripple. Available withdrawal methods may vary depending on the region you're trading from.
$faq@-2-a-2: For most payment methods, the minimum deposit requirement is {{@minDepositSum}} or the equivalent in your account currency. After making a deposit in this amount, you can safely start trading and making real profits. Please note that the minimum deposit amount may vary depending on the payment system you use. You can find detailed information about the minimum deposit for each payment systems found in the Cash Register section.
$faq@-2-a-3: The maximum amount you can deposit in a single transaction is {{@maxDepositSum}} or the equivalent amount in the account currency. There is no limit to the number of deposit transactions you can make.
$faq@-2-q-4: When will my money reach my Binarium account?
$faq@-2-a-4: Your deposit is reflected in your account as soon as you confirm the payment. The money on the bank account is reserved, and then immediately displayed on the platform and in your Binarium account.
$faq@-2-q-5: My payment was declined. What should I do?
$faq@-2-a-5: Various factors could result in this issue. Please email us at support@binarium.com or contact our Customer support team via online chat with as many details as you can about the issue. We'll try to resolve it as soon as we can.
$faq@-2-a-6:
Your account type is determined by the total of deposits and the real trading volume. Upgrade your account by topping up and being active on the platform. We don't charge fees for keeping your account type. It stays with you for unlimited time.

Find out more in the Account types section.
$faq@-2-q-7: Still have questions? Get in touch with us
$faq@-2-a-7: Get help from our online customer support chat or email us at support@binarium.com to request a callback. We'll contact you within an hour (during customer support operating hours).
$faq@-3-a-0: For most payment methods, the minimum withdrawal amount is {{@minWithdrawalSum}} or the equivalent in the your account currency. Please note that the minimum withdrawal amount may vary depending on the payment system you use.
$faq@-3-a-1: For most payment methods, the maximum withdraw amount is {{@maxWithdrawalSum}} or the equivalent in the currency of your account. Please note that the maximum withdrawal amount may vary depending on the payment system you use. Detailed information on each payment system's restrictions can be found in the Cash Register section. Restrictions are set to allow getting funds as quickly as possible.
$faq@-3-a-2:
More than this. We cover your payment system fees when you top up your account or withdraw funds.

However, if your trading volume (the sum of all your trades) isn't at least twice as big as your deposit, we may not cover the 10% fee of the requested withdrawal amount.
$faq@-3-q-3: It takes 1 hour to process withdrawal request
$faq@-3-a-3:
If your account is fully verified and meets all the platform requirements, we'll be able to process your withdrawal request within one hour.

In case your account hasn't been verified, the withdrawal request will take up to three business days to process. Binarium accepts no more than one request per day from an unverified account.

Please note, we only process requests during the financial department's operating hours (09:00–22:00 (GMT +3) Monday to Friday). We also process a limited number of requests on weekends. If you've submitted an application when the financial department was closed, it will be processed at the beginning of the next business day.
$faq@-3-a-4:
Binarium cares about your security. That's why verification is mandatory for submitting a withdrawal request. It is a guarantee that your funds won't become fraud or money laundering target.

We transfer money only to the bank accounts that were previously used to fund your Binarium account. In the event that the original funding account is no longer available or you topped up your account with several payment methods, please, contact our Customer support team via online chat or email us at support@binarium.com with a detailed description of the issue.
$faq@-3-a-5:
Verification is mandatory for withdrawals. You must verify your ID and the payment methods you use to deposit funds to your account.

First, make sure all the personal data fields in your profile are filled out. Then go to the Verification section and follow the instructions. Please don't conceal or touch up parts of the scans or photos except for those mentioned in the instructions.

The use of third-party payment details is prohibited. Withdrawals cannot be made to unverified payment methods.

If you have questions about verification, give us a call, chat online with us, or send us an email. We'll be happy to help!
$faq@-3-q-6: I can't submit a withdrawal request
$faq@-3-a-6:
Check if you completed all the fields in your profile. To check, go to Profile settings. If the entered data is incorrect or incomplete, the request may be rejected or processing delayed. Make sure you've entered your account information or wallet number correctly (the symbols +, *, /, () and spaces before, after and in the middle are prohibited).

If all the information is entered correctly but the problem still persists, contact our Support team via the online chat or message the online chat with a description of the issue.
$faq@-3-q-7: My withdrawal request is approved, but I haven't received the money yet
$faq@-3-a-7:
Transfers take different amounts of time depending on your payment method.

In case of withdrawal to bank cards the process consists of several stages, and the transaction processing time depends on the issuing bank. It can take up to several business days for the money to reach a bank card. Contact your bank to learn the details.

Funds are credited to e-wallets within one hour after the request has been approved by the Binarium financial department.

One of the possible reasons for a delay are unforeseen circumstances. These include technical problems in the processing center and e-wallet system failures.

If this is the case, please be patient, as the circumstances are beyond our control. If the funds haven't been credited to your card or wallet within the specified time, please contact our Support team for assistance.
$faq@-3-q-8: Still have questions? Get in touch with us
$faq@-3-a-8: Get help from our online customer support chat or email us at support@binarium.com to request a callback. We'll contact you within an hour (during customer support operating hours).
$faq@-4-a-0:
Bonuses are funds you receive in addition to your deposit to increase your trading potential. The bonus amount depends on your deposit amount and account status. Bonuses are credited to a separate bonus account.

We offer the following types of bonuses:

  • a welcome bonus for new clients for making their first deposit
  • bonuses for participating in company promos
  • risk-free trades and deposit insurance (more detailed information about these bonus types available below)
  • prize bonuses received from free Binarium tournaments (the prize fund is distributed among participants depending on place taken)

The conditions for receiving a bonus and its size are individual in each case. The company has the right to revoke issued bonuses if you violate any provisions of the Client Agreement.

If multiple deposits were made due to payment system restrictions, contact Support to receive a bonus for the total deposit amount.

You can decline a bonus when making a deposit.
$faq@-4-a-1:
You can make trades without risking your deposit. When you open a risk-free trade, no funds are debited from your balance, and any profit is credited to your real account.

Risk-free trades are accrued when making deposits to your account using promo codes and as part of special offers. The number and size of risk-free trades are indicated in the promo or promo code description. You can open risk-free trades at any time, but they will be voided if you withdraw funds.

Your available risk-free trades are displayed on the platform to the right above the green Higher button.

How do they work?

An amount equal to the total amount of the risk-free trade (shown in the promo or promo code description) is reserved from your real account and credited to your bonus account. Conditions for processing and withdrawing bonus funds, in this case, are similar to those for regular bonuses.

For example, you deposit $100 to your account and receive three $10 risk-free trades. Therefore, $30 is reserved from your real balance and credited to your bonus account. You can use these $30 to open three risk-free trades in a row with possible losses compensated by the platform. Total compensation from the platform can't exceed the deposit amount.

The terms and conditions for processing bonus funds from risk-free trades are similar to the terms and conditions for regular bonuses.
$faq@-4-a-2:
Deposit insurance is a type of bonuses offered by Binarium. We'll cover possible losses for a specific number of your trades.

Deposit insurance rules:

  • only the first consecutive trades are insured;
  • the investment in one trade cannot exceed 33% of the total deposit;
  • the amount of compensation from the platform cannot exceed the deposit amount.

For instance, a trader received five insured trades, and after they were closed the account balance was less than before the trades. According to the rules, the platform compensates the difference. In this event the funds credited as compensation are considered bonus funds and the rules applied to them are similar to the ones for the regular bonuses.

If the terms and conditions on which the insurance is provided are met, contact the Customer support team to receive your compensation.
$faq@-4-a-3:
Bonus funds, including money earned with bonus funds and in free tournaments, are available for withdrawal only after the necessary trade turnover is achieved. The bonus itself can not be withdrawn immediately after it has been accrued.

To withdraw the deposit bonus (bonuses received for depositing money to the account), you need to achieve x40 turnover of the amount of the bonus accrued. To withdraw the tradeback bonus, you must achieve x20 turnover of the amount of the tradeback received.

Say, you've made a deposit and accrued $150 as a bonus. The total turnover must be $150x40 = $6,000. On achieving x40 turnover, you can withdraw the bonus funds.

For a no deposit bonus, you need to achieve x50 turnover of the amount of the bonus accrued. The maximum withdrawal amount can't exceed the amount of the no deposit bonus accrued.

Both profitable and unprofitable transactions are taken into account. Trades closed at the opening price are not considered. There are no restrictions on the withdrawal of profits. However, if you are going to withdraw part of the deposit you received the bonus for, then the bonus is automatically deducted from your account.

Please note that the strategy of doubling deals (Martingale) is forbidden on the trading platform, and trades made with the help of this strategy are not considered in processing the bonus. They can also be cancelled by the company's decision.

Up to 5% of the bonus amount is considered in total turnover per trade. For example, you received a $5,000 bonus, which means that the maximum amount counted as a bonus for one open trade can't exceed $250.
$faq@-4-q-4: Still have questions? Get in touch with us
$faq@-4-a-4: Get help from our online customer support chat or email us at support@binarium.com to request a callback. We'll contact you within an hour (during customer support operating hours).
$faq@-5-a-0: {{@maxDealSum}} or an equivalent amount in your account currency. Depending on the account type, up to 20 trades in the maximum amount can be opened simultaneously. More information about account types and their features can be found here.
$faq@-5-a-1: The trade amount can't be less than {{@minDealSum}} or the equivalent amount in your account currency.
$faq@-5-q-2: How do I make a trade?
$faq@-5-a-2:
Select an asset, expiration time and investment amount. Then decide on the price dynamics. If you expect the value of the asset to increase, click the green Call button. To bet on the price decrease, click the red Put button.

Please note that on Binarium systematic use of the Martingale strategy (doubling up trade size) is strictly prohibited. Violations of this rule may result in the trades deemed as invalid and your account blocked.
$faq@-5-a-3: Review your trades in the History section. Access it either from the left menu of the terminal or the dropdown menu in the upper right corner by clicking on the user profile and selecting the Trading history section.
$faq@-5-a-4: Up to 90% on Binarium. Represents the percentage of investment that the trader gets after a trade expires in-the-money.
$faq@-5-q-5: How can I monitor my active trades?
$faq@-5-a-5: Trade progress is displayed in the asset chart and the History section (in the left menu). The platform allows you to work with 4 charts at once.
$faq@-5-q-6: At what time trading is available on Binarium platform?
$faq@-5-a-6: Trading on all assets is possible from Monday to Friday. You can trade only cryptocurrency, LATAM and GSMI indices, as well as OTC assets on weekends.
$faq@-5-a-7: Find trading hours for every Binarium asset in the Asset catalogue section.
$faq@-5-a-8:
Full trade details are stored in the Binraium system. Asset type, opening and closing price, trade opening and expiry time (accurate to one second) are recorded for every opened trade.

In the event of any doubts about the accuracy of quotes, contact Binarium Customer support team with a request to investigate the case and compare quotes with their supplier. The request processing takes at least three business days.
$faq@-5-q-9: Why Binarium quotes are different from those on FOREX and other sources?
$faq@-5-a-9:
Possible reasons include:

  • quotes from different sources may vary slightly;
  • FOREX quotes are displayed as Bid (demand price) and Ask (offer price); Binarium displays the average quote, which is calculated as (Bid+Ask)÷2;
  • a minor difference in the time when quotes are received may cause them to differ in the 4th-5th decimal places.

When registering, you accept that Binarium quotes have priority. They may not coincide with quotations from other resources. Third-party resources can only be considered as auxiliary tools and cannot be used to verify quotes.
$faq@-5-q-10: Still have questions? Get in touch with us
$faq@-5-a-10: Get help from our online customer support chat or email us at support@binarium.com to request a callback. We'll contact you within an hour (during customer support operating hours).
$faq@-6-q-0: Where are tournaments located on the platform?
$faq@-6-a-0:
The Tournaments section is located in the menu on the left. It shows the list of available tournaments, which are divided by type as follows:

  • Current - these are tournaments that have already started and are available for participation.
  • Future - these are tournaments planned for the near future. You can pay the participation fee right now, but the tournament account will only appear when the tournament starts.
  • Archive - these are tournaments that have ended. You can see winners, their results, and prizes.
$faq@-6-a-1:
Binarium holds two both free and paid tournaments.

Free tournaments are one-day tournaments held every week on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays. Simply register to participate. The prize fund is $1,500. Prizes are credited as a bonus which needs to be processed to be withdrawn.

Paid tournaments are tournaments that require a small tournament fee ($5–$15) to enter. Prizes are credited as real money that must also be processed to be withdrawn (х2). The company reserves the right to not pay a prize if there is no trading volume on the real account. Paid tournaments vary in duration from daily to monthly. The tournament duration is specified in the tournament's terms and conditions available on Binarium.
$faq@-6-q-2: The tournament currency is US dollars. My account is in another currency. What should I do?
$faq@-6-a-2: The participation fee will be debited in your account currency in the equivalent according to the dollar exchange rate at the time of the transaction. Prize funds will be credited to your account in your account currency in the same manner.
$faq@-6-q-3: Can I opt out of the tournament after I've paid the tournament fee?
$faq@-6-a-3: Unfortunately, you can't opt out of the tournament, and your fee can't be refunded.
$faq@-6-q-4: How do I switch to the tournament account and trade as part of the tournament?
$faq@-6-a-4: You can switch to the tournament account by clicking your balance in the top right corner of the platform. The tournament account is only visible for registered users alongside their real and demo accounts once the tournament starts. In the drop-down menu, select the desired tournament account, open trades, and increase your balance amount to win.
$faq@-6-q-5: Can I use my real account during the tournament?
$faq@-6-a-5: Yes, you can trade from any available account (demo, real, tournament) at any moment. To switch between accounts, click your balance in the top right corner of the platform and select the desired account in the drop-down menu.
$faq@-6-q-6: Why can't I find my name on the tournament list?
$faq@-6-a-6: Your name will be displayed on the tournament list only after you've opened at least 10 trades from your tournament account.
$faq@-6-q-7: What should I do if my entire tournament balance is spent? Additional purchases.
$faq@-6-a-7: You can continue to participate in the tournament after making an additional purchase. An additional purchase is the procedure for restoring your starting tournament balance. The cost of the additional purchase is specified in the tournament rules and is usually the same as the tournament fee. The additional purchase should not be confused with depositing funds to your tournament balance. If the tournament account balance is $999 and the starting balance is $1,000, you'll have $1,000 on your account after making an additional purchase. It makes sense to make an additional purchase when the starting balance is spent. You can make an unlimited number of additional purchases.
$faq@-6-q-8: How is the tournament winner selected?
$faq@-6-a-8: The trader with the most funds in their tournament account at the end of the tournament wins. Prize-winning traders receive real funds or bonuses, depending on the type of tournament.
$faq@-6-q-9: How do I withdraw the tournament prize?
$faq@-6-a-9: Winners of paid tournament receive real funds as prizes that need to be processed for withdrawal (x2). Binarium reserves the right to not approve the withdrawal request if there is no trading volume on the real account. In free tournaments, the prize is credited to the winner's bonus account, and the same conditions apply to its withdrawal as for a regular bonus.
$faq@-6-q-10: Can I withdraw funds from my tournament account?
$faq@-6-a-10: The funds in the tournament account are virtual and can't be withdrawn.
$faq@-6-q-11: Can I participate in several tournaments?
$faq@-6-a-11: Sure! A separate tournament account is displayed in the platform for every tournament you participate in. To switch between accounts, click the balance in the top right corner of the platform.
$faq@-6-a-12: Deductions reflect the percentage of participants' contributions that will be added to the tournament prize fund. This means that the prize fund can increase; the more participants there are, the bigger the prizes will be. Deductions are added to the prize fund after participation fees fully cover it.
$faq@-6-q-13: Still have questions? Get in touch with us
$faq@-6-a-13: Get help from our online customer support chat or email us at support@binarium.com to request a callback. We'll contact you within an hour (during customer support operating hours).
$faq@-7-a-0: Tradeback is partial compensation for losses experienced on the real account in the previous week. Tradeback is only credited to your account if the week was unprofitable, meaning that the amount of unprofitable trades opened from the real account for the last week is higher than profitable ones. The tradeback's amount and format (bonus or real funds) are determined by your account type. Read more about this in the Account types section.
$faq@-7-a-1: If applicable, tradeback is credited every Tuesday at 00:00 GMT+0.
$faq@-7-a-2:
The procedure for withdrawing tradeback is similar to that of a regular bonus. It's easier to withdraw tradeback accrued to the bonus account. You can do so after achieving x20 trading volume (x40 for a bonus).

VIP account holders have a perk when withdrawing tradeback as they receive it as real funds that don't need to be processed and can be withdrawn immediately.
$faq@-7-a-3:
Tradeback is accrued only for the loss of the real funds. Losses of the bonus funds aren't considered when tradeback is calculated. If both bonus and real funds were used for trade, only real funds would be considered as a loss for the tradeback calculations.

Tradeback is calculated by the platform according to the following formula: The last week's loss multiplied by the tradeback percentage corresponding to the account type. The higher the account status, the higher the payout percentage.

Say, the loss of the Business account holder (10% deduction) during the last week was $1,000. The tradeback is: $1,000×10%=$100.
$faq@-7-a-4: You can disable tradeback in your personal account under the Tradeback options section. You can enable the service at any time. You can't receive payouts for the period in which tradeback was disabled.
$faq@-7-q-5: I didn't receive tradeback. Why is that?
$faq@-7-a-5:
There may be several reasons for it:

  • You didn't experience any losses for the past week
  • You haven't reached the minimum amount for a weekly tradeback accrue (i.e., $5). If the tradeback amount is under that amount, payouts won't be made.
  • Tradeback wasn't accrued for the loss of bonus funds.

It's extremely rare that tradeback is credited late. We usually credit tradebacks every Tuesday between 12:00 and 00:00 GMT+0.
$faq@-7-a-6: Get help from our online customer support chat or e-mail us at support@binarium.com to request a callback. We'll contact you within an hour (during customer support operating hours).
$email-collect@title: We would like to collect your email
$email-collect@text:
We process personal data in accordance with Client agreement and Privacy policy.

Collecting your email helps us to protect your account. You may receive emails from us and can opt out any time.
$email-collect@checkbox: I give permission to collect my email for the above mentioned purposes
$verification@email@info: Revise su correo electrónico: le enviamos un mensaje con un enlace de confirmación. Haga clic en ese enlace para confirmar su dirección de correo electrónico.
$verification@email@confirmed: Su correo electrónico se ha confirmado correctamente
$verification@email@not-received:
¿No recibió el mensaje?

Verifique que haya ingresado la dirección correcta arriba y haga clic en el botón de abajo:
$verification@email@has-been-sent: Se envió el mensaje con el enlace. Revise su bandeja de entrada y siga el enlace de confirmación.
$verification@email@next-error: Podemos enviarle un nuevo mensaje en {{ nextEmail }} minutos. Para activar su cuenta, consulte su correo electrónico o póngase en contacto con nuestro Soporte.
$verification@formats: Formatos: jpg, jpeg, png, tiff, pdf. Tamaño de archivo: no más de 1 Mb
$verification@error@detach: An error occurred. Please try again later.
$verification@error@size: El tamaño del archivo es mayor al permitido de 1 Mb.
$verification@error@format: Formato de archivo inválido. Aceptamos jpg, png, pdf o tiff.
$verification@error@limit: The document upload limit has been exceeded. You can request to increase the limit by e-mailing us at support@binarium.com
$verification@file@front-drop: Arrastre aquí una foto o escaneo de la cara delantera de la tarjeta
$verification@file@back-drop: Arrastre aquí una foto o escaneo de la cara trasera de la tarjeta
$verification@file@screen-drop: Arrastre aquí una captura de pantalla
$verification@file@passport-drop: Arrastre aquí una foto o escaneo de su pasaporte
$verification@callback: Si necesitamos información adicional para verificar su cuenta, alguien del soporte de Binarium le contactará por correo electrónico o por teléfono.
$verification@passport@description:
Suba una foto o escaneo de su pasaporte, ábralo de forma que se vean su foto y su firma.

  1. Todos los detalles, incluyendo la serie y número del pasaporte, deben estar claramente legibles;
  2. Está prohibido recortar o editar la imagen, incluyendo ediciones para ocultar parte de los detalles;
  3. Formatos aceptables: jpg, png, tiff o pdf; tamaño de hasta 1 Mb.
$verification@card@description:
Suba una foto o escaneo de ambos lados de la tarjeta, respetando las siguientes reglas:

  1. Los primeros 6 y los últimos 4 dígitos del número de la tarjeta deben verse claramente (p. ej.. 5304 03XX XXXX 1111); los otros 6 dígitos del medio deben estar ocultos;
  2. El nombre y apellido del titular de la tarjeta deben verse claramente y coincidir con los detalles provistos en el perfil del usuario en la plataforma de Binarium;
  3. La fecha de vencimiento de la tarjeta debe verse claramente;
  4. La cara trasera de la tarjeta debe estar firmada por el titular;
  5. El código CVV debe estar oculto;
  6. Formatos aceptables: jpg, png, tiff o pdf; tamaño de hasta 1 Mb.
$verification@screen@description:
Sube una captura de pantalla de tu monedero en línea en formato jpg, png, tiff o pdf. El tamaño del archivo no debe superar los 1 Mb. En la captura de pantalla debería verse lo siguiente:

  1. Una transacción para cargar su cuenta en la plataforma Binarium;
  2. Todas las transacciones correspondientes al mes en la que cargó su cuenta de Binarium;
  3. El número de monedero y los detalles del titular (deben coincidir con los detalles indicados en el perfil de usuario en la plataforma Binarium).
$verification@comment@UNDER_LEGAL_AGE: Hemos determinado a partir de los documentos que suministró que usted no ha cumplido los 18 años. De acuerdo con el Convenio del cliente de Binarium, no trabajamos con personas menores de 18, por lo que nos vemos obligados a rechazar la verificación de su cuenta. Nos complacerá contar con usted como cliente cuando cumpla los 18 años.
$verification@comment@WRONG_NAME: Nos vemos obligados a rechazar la verificación, debido a que el nombre en el documento que subió y el nombre indicado en su perfil no coinciden. Por favor, corrija el nombre en su perfil para que coincida con el nombre mostrado en el documento. El equipo de Binarium estará encantado de analizar su nueva solicitud.
$verification@comment@BAD_FORMAT: La plataforma no acepta el formato del archivo que subió. Aceptamos archivos en formatos jpg, png, pdf y tiff. Por favor suba el documento en uno de estos formatos y estaremos encantados de analizar su nueva solicitud de verificación.
$verification@comment@WRONG_DOCUMENT: El tipo de documento que nos suministró no puede usarse con fines de verificación, ya que no contiene los detalles necesarios. Por favor suba otro documento y envíe una nueva solicitud de verificación.
$verification@comment@LOW_QUALITY: La calidad de imágenes subidas no permite estudiar y verificar los documentos. Por favor suba los documentos en una resolución mayor y nos aseguraremos de analizar su solicitud lo antes posible.
$verification@comment@INVALID_SIGNATURE: Los documentos que subió no están firmados. Un documento sin firma no es válido y no puede verificarse. Por favor, suba una foto o escaneo de un documento firmado para completar la verificación.
$verification@comment@EDITED_DOCUMENT: Los documentos que subió han sido alterados o recortados usando software de edición gráfica. La política de la empresa no permite aceptar archivos subidos con este tipo de modificaciones, por lo que nos vemos obligados a rechazar su verificación. Por favor suba sus documentos en la versión original, cumpliendo con todos los requerimientos de la plataforma. ¡Estaremos encantados de revisar su nueva solicitud de verificación!
$verification@comment@CONTACT_SUPP0RT: Debemos aclarar un par de detalles: por favor contáctenos a través del chat en línea, por correo electrónico o por teléfono.
$verification@intro@common: El procedimiento de verificación para usuarios de Binarium aumenta la seguridad de su cuenta y le ayuda a hacer retiros con más rapidez.
$verification@intro@email: Por favor, verifique su dirección de correo electrónico para mejorar la protección de su cuenta.
$verification@intro@load-safety: para hacer transacciones seguras y retirar fondos rápidamente.
$tournament@empty@current:
No hay torneos activos en este momento. Pero están a punto de comenzar.

Preste atención a la pestaña "Próximamente" del menú de arriba para estar al tanto de las noticias y correos electrónicos de la plataforma.
$tournament@empty@future: No hay concursos futuros programados. Por favor, siga nuestras noticias y nuestros boletines.
BG-7519$menu@main-description: The release of US companies' earnings reports is the most anticipated event among traders. Due to the the huge flow of news, trading during earnings season can bring substantial profits.
BG-7519$text:
We've decided to make this season even more profitable for you. On the day a company's earnings report is released, Binarium will double the profitability of that company's stock. The promotion will run from July 20 through August 20.

Follow the earnings calendar and earn on stocks for the world's biggest companies.
BG-7519$tutorial@title: How to use the Earnings Calendar
BG-7519$tutorial@text:
The way to trade during earnings season is simple. The first company to release its earnings report is NETFLIX.

The calendar shows you the forecast for the stock's price is an increase of up to $3.18. If the price increases,
so will demand for the stock. In this case, we recommend buying.
BG-7519$help@text: Contact one of our experts, who'll be glad to help you.
BG-7519$footer@risk: Risk disclosure. Trading operations made on Binarium platform involve a significant risk of loss of a capital. Please, read carefully the general trading conditions on our website before making any investments. You are given the right of personal, non-commercial use of the information located on this site. The right to use is limited, not exclusive. The company's activities are conducted outside the Russian Federation.
BG-7519$footer@copyright: © 2021 Binarium Ltd. 8 years on the market
BG-7519-popup$support:
You can read more about the promotion's details here.
If you have any questions, please contact an analyst
BG-7519-popup$asset: We're increasing the profitability of {{@asset}} by:
BG-7519-popup$1-text: US earnings season is starting today. Don't miss your chance to earn up to 90% more on Netflix's stock.
BG-7519-popup$2-text: Microsoft's releasing its earnings report today. Trade on Binarium for your chance to earn up to 90% more on the company's stock.
BG-7519-popup$3-text: Which stocks should you invest in? Apple's releasing its earnings report today, and you can earn up to 90% more when investing in the company's stock.
BG-7519-popup$4-text: Want to find out how to earn on McDonald's stock? It's releasing its earnings report today, and you can earn up to 90% more when you invest in the company's stock.
BG-7519-popup$5-text: Earnings season is heating up! Google's releasing its earnings report today, and we're increasing earnings opportunities on the company's stock by up to 90%.
BG-7519-popup$6-text: Dreaming of a car? Earn towards your dream by investing in Tesla's stock. It's reporting earnings today, and we're increasing earnings opportunities on the company's stock by up to 90%.
BG-7519-popup$7-text: Earnings season is almost over. NVIDIA's earnings report is coming out today. Invest in the company's stock with up to 90% more profitability.
BG-7519-popup$8-text: Earnings season is almost over. Hurry to earn up to 90% more on Alibaba's stock.
